metadata.title: Data Base of Pollock Fisheries by Korea, Poland, and China in the Donut Hole Area of the Central Bering Sea during 1984 - 1991

creators.name: Research, Korean Data by Mr. Hynn-Su Jo of National Fisheries
Development Agency, Pujan, Republic of Korea.

metadata.description: Historical Data Base of Pollock Fisheries by Korea, Poland, and China in the Central Bering Sea taken during 1984 - 1991 by monthly periods by statistical blocks of 1/2 degree Latitude by 1 degree Longitude.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To preserve historical fisheries catches in the central Bering Sea.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: Permission of contact person required.

Use constraints: Permission of contact person required.
